All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RenderingSurface
public abstract class AnimatingSurface
extends Surface
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class implements a rendering surface that will repaint itself continiously using a low-priority thread.

This class is based on the Java 2D demo examples.

See Also:
Serialized Form
